member.name: T:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController
member.description: Methods for creating, retrieving, updating and deleting IP addresses for a broadband user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.Get(System.String)
Gets broadband IP information
member.description: Retrieves the static, routed and Ipv6 information of a broadband user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.Post(System.String)
Assigns a static IPv4 address
member.description: Assigns a static IPv4 address to a broadband user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.Post(System.String,API.Controllers.Broadband.Types.broadband_ip_allocation)
Assigns a routed IPv4 address
member.description: Assigns a routed IPv4 address of the supplied size to a broadband user and updates the RIPE database with the supplied RIPE NIC handle. If the current allocation is dynamic a static IP will also be created.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.Delete(System.String)
Removes a static IP address
member.description: Removes a static IP address and all routed subnets from a broadband user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.Delete(System.String,API.Controllers.Broadband.Types.broadband_ip_deallocation)
Removes a routed subnet
member.description: Removes a routed subnet from a broadband user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.CreateRoutedIp(System.String,API.Controllers.Broadband.Types.broadband_ip_allocation)
member.summary: Assigns a routed IP address to a user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.CreateStaticIp(System.String)
member.summary: Assigns a static IP address to a user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.GetIpAllocations(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the static, routed and Ipv6 information for a user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.GetIpv4Properties(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates properties of an IP address.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.DeleteRoutedIp(System.String,API.Controllers.Broadband.Types.broadband_ip_deallocation)
member.summary: Remove a routed subnet from a user.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandIpController.DeleteStaticIp(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a static IP address from a user and all routed subnets.

member.description: Orders a migration of an existing ADSL broadband connection for a telephone line or address.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandProductController.Get
Gets broadband products available to reseller
member.description: Retrieves the reseller's available broadband products that can be ordered and their costs.

example.title: Response

member.name: M:API.Controllers.Broadband.BroadbandProductController.Get(System.Int32)
Gets broadband ADSL product for a product ID
member.description: Retrieves the reseller's ADSL product details for a specific product ID.

example.title: Response
example.content: HTTP/1.1 200 OK { "id": 153, "name": "Home 2GB Capped 20CN 512k", "category": "Home ADSL Broadband Products", "price": 8.5, "fast_track_price": 200, "provider": "WBC - 20CN", "technology": "ADSL", "down_speed": 512, "up_speed": 256, "peak_cap": 2, "off_peak_cap": 100, "contention": 50, "product_class": "Home", "provider_lead_time": 7, "migration_lead_time": 7, "peak_start": %peak_start%, "peak_end": %peak_end%, "contract_length": 1, "legacy_product": false, "requires_out_line_rental": false, "unlimeted_cap": false }
